content: 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in each of next 2 st 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st pull leg forward and working behind 2 half_double_crochet in each of 2 round 7 skip sts x 5 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to join finish off 40 single_crochet 20 half_double_crochet round 10 with yarn d slip_stitch in any st skip st 5 half_double_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st x 20 forming last slip_stitch over 1st slip_stitch to join finish off 20 slip_stitch 100 half_double_crochet round 11 in this round the legs of the starfish begin to be tacked down i have not specified the exact position as the legs curve naturally and slightly differently depending which version you chose and your gauge the aim is to produce a life like posture pat your square down and decide where the legs fall in the most relaxed way then as you form the scs of this round when you come to a leg take in the locking bar of the nearest bullion or two strands at the back of a puff with the stitch i found this will be the 2nd or 3rd bullion or puff from the centre all stitches are worked blo starting with yarn c in the 2nd half_double_crochet of a group of 5 single_crochet in each of next 3 half_double_crochet decrease across next 2 half_double_crochet skipping slip_stitch between x 20 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to join finish off 60 single_crochet 20 decrease the piece will look a little full at this stage this will correct itself in further rounds round 12 starting with yarn d in any decrease with yarn d 5 half_double_crochet in decrease skip st slip_stitch in next st skip st x 3 5 double_crochet in next decrease slip_stitch half_double_crochet in next st corner st made slip_stitch 5 double_crochet in next decrease skip st slip_stitch skip st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join finish off 40 double_crochet 64 half_double_crochet 20 slip_stitch round 13 in this round the legs of the starfish continue to be tacked down as in round 11 i have not specified the exact position as the legs curve naturally and serpent star copyright lettice rose 2024 slightly differently depending which version you chose and your gauge the aim is to produce a life like posture i found this will be the 5th bullion or puff from the centre all stitches are worked blo starting with yarn c in the 1st double_crochet after a corner half_double_crochet single_crochet in each of next 4 double_crochet decrease across next double_crochet and half_double_crochet skipping slip_stitch between single_crochet in each of next 3 half_double_crochet decrease across next 2 half_double_crochet skipping slip_stitch between x 2 single_crochet in each of next 3 st decrease across next half_double_crochet and double_crochet skipping slip_stitch between single_crochet in each of next 4 double_crochet chain 2 skip slip_stitch half_double_crochet slip_stitch x 4 slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join finish off 68 single_crochet 16 decrease 4 chain- 2 round 14 starting with
